relevant_findings.HEENT: Sclerae anicteric, MMM, oropharynx clear. No dentition.
relevant_findings.neck: Supple, JVP not elevated, no LAD
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Distant heart sounds. RRR, Nl S1, S2, no r/m/g
relevant_findings.abdomen: +BS, distended and obese, soft, tender to deep palpation over RLQ. No rebound tenderness or guarding. Hepatic border palpated 7cm below the costal margin.
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, perfused, trace pedal pulses, no clubbing, trace cyanosis, no edema
relevant_findings.neurological: CNs 2-12 intact, motor function grossly normal
relevant_findings.skin: Erythematous, non-pruritic blanching patches over upper extremities bilaterally. Diffuse maculopapular rash over upper abdomen and chest with excoriations, but non-pruritic.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Significant improvement in abdominal pain, and no other complaints besides feeling thirsty.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement in abdominal pain noted upon arrival to the floor.
